content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home sunday night down i-85 and stopped at a gas station to use the restroom and get a drink.  after my purchase, i walked out of the store and just happened to look up in the sky. i'm not entirely sure what compelled me to look up at that moment, however i must admit i tend to look up and enjoy the stars frequently.  as i looked up i noticed a rather large ball of orange light. at first glance it looked similar to a night time rocket launch, but upon looking further i realized the object was far too large to be a rocket, and looked nearly perfectly spherical.  as i looked at this object, i noted it had no beacon lights whatsoever and no visible fuselage. it was as bright, if not brighter than the moon and i felt like with the luminosity it carried it should have reflected any material that would make up an aircraft or bodywork.  the orb itself was an amber color, lighter in color and brighter at the center and more orange around the edges; although i should point out there were no visible 'edges' to be seen, it was diffuse around the circumference. this object was going very slowly across the sky at what my best estimate is east to west in what i could tell was a straight path.  it's difficult to gauge, but i would say this object had an altitude of approximately 1000ft, and was certainly within our atmosphere.  when i had first noticed it, the orb was slightly to my left maybe 30 degrees, and i had anticipated some sort of sound as it drew closer, however throughout the whole observation there was absolutely no noise emitted at all.  the object continued on it's path (still slowly) until it got about 40-45 degrees to my right, where it seemed to arc to it's left (away from me) and a few seconds after that it dissipated and disappeared.  i had anticipated watching it until it went over the horizon or behind trees, however the dissipation made a strange event even stranger. it contracted a bit from the outside edges inward, and then dissolved until it was just the black sky left.  the duration of the dissipation was about 2-3 seconds, and the entire duration of the observation was nearly 5 minutes long.  at one point a guy leaving the gas station had seen me staring up into the sky mesmerized, and looked up too.  after a second he turned to me and asked "what is that? ...Some sort of airplane or something?" to which i replied "it certainly doesn't look like any aircraft i have ever seen."  he grew visibly uncomfortable, got into his car and quickly left.  a few additional notes to consider which may be helpful are the visual effects i experienced while observing this object.  while it was as bright as the moon, fairly bright for the night sky, it wasn't blinding.  however when i closed my eyes i could still see the glow, as if i had been looking into something very bright.  also while looking directly at it, it seemed to be a solid ball of light, however when viewed through my peripheral sight it was pulsing similar to an old tube computer monitor.  i would estimate around 60hz or so.  at one point i attempted to phone my girlfriend to explain to her what i was witnessing, but my cell had no reception or bars, which could be incidental but i generally get good reception in charlotte and i did find it odd my phone wouldn't even dial out.  

i don't claim to be an expert, but i do have quite a bit of knowledge in regards to aircraft and helicopters both military and civilian, and this object did not fit the paradigm of anything i am aware of.  in fact, the whole reason i have submitted this report is because of how strange of an incident this entire situation was.  i never felt upset, frightened or perturbed in any way, however i must say i am very, very intrigued as to what this could have been.  i hope this helps and would love to know if anyone else witnessed this event.
content.summary: Orange orb flies slowly over charlotte

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to assistant state director today by e-mail and phone: 

e-mail report: 
"me and my boyfriend saw what appeared to be a ufo, we were driving and saw the object because it was pretty low, we thought it was an airplane or something until we saw about 7 or 8 lights at the bottom of it, it sped away pretty fast, we kept driving and saw it again, we had our camera phone out recording it, and it came back to us, right over us in a matter of seconds, i saw lots of blueish whitish lights at the bottom, we have some of it on video, this happened monday night around 8-9 o'clock p.M., on our way home, not too far from home."

the witness called me today and further stated that it would take a car to cover the object up at arm's length. the lights were all facing downward. she said that it took off at a fast speed, then returned and hovered right over their vehicle.  her boyfriend took video of it with her cell phone and she is sending it to me.  the object then just floated away slowly.
content.summary: Large craft moved away then back right over our vehicle

content.detailedDescription: At 0147 i was walking my dog to the street corner . i heard and saw a small jet pass over heading towards tampa airport. as i followed the jet to the horizon , i caught a flash of light from the corner of my eye. and i noted it was in the orion constellation just below the his shield arm (upper right star from belt stars). my first thought was that it was an incoming jet to tampa. then it blinked again and i was sure then,that it was a jet with its bright running lights on incoming to me.I then walked my dog back up into our cul-de-sac towards our back yard. i then stopped so she could pee. i saw the light blink again .And i thought it was odd because it had not moved at all from its relative spot from within the orion costellation. it also appeared to be somewhat dimmer x2.But still very visable. so i stopped and started to observe the light.I then noticed the light blink and it was again brighter than the last time it blinked. i then looked at it, as a banking aircraft. my military training started to kick in (7212 stinger missle gunner 71/2 yr usmc)as i thought maybe this was a light plane or helicopter in some sort of distress or running drugs into the bay area (yeah this is a slow mover). then i started to count in between blinks. i would get a 5 or 7 count (football count) and then the light would blink again at the same position within orion. i then took up a spot next to a tree in my yard so i could get a movement read from the trees outline, relative to orion. the light didnt really move. and this observation lasted about 5 minutes (and that was odd to me). then the light juked from left to right almost to orions belt (i was stunned).At this time i was checking myself !! the light then juked back right to left to almost the same spot under the shield star (what the hell). the light stayed in the same spot for about 2 more minutes. it then juked again right to left, but not as far . but when it blinked out this time i could make out an aura impression upon the black sky. it was like someone had had printed a grey line on a black chalk board.And it was then i noticed a residue imprint upon my left field of veiw. i then raised my right hand to get a finger distance (2).It then struck  me that i may be watching an incoming missle change its course in low to mid atomosphere. i got a hold of myself and waited for the light to blink 3 more times . i picked up my dog and went back inside at 0208 and woke up my daughter and her fiancee. i told them to come outside and look at something . i didnt tell them anything else except to look at the orion constellation, that was the only instruction/warning i gave them. for the next 4 minutes we observed the light change distance , direction and light  magnatude at least 5 times ,going between orions belt to more or less into the center of the constellation. and we asked each other during our observation are we all seeing the same thing. yes !! the final blink was in the middle of orion. we spent another 5 minutes waiting to spot a airplane or anything that would explain what we had just seen. we then moved from the cul-de-sac area to our side yard. trying to get a different observation angle on the same area of the sky. still we could not detect anything flying except about 7 to 9 herons flew over low in formation heading towards our local park.Another 5 minutes of observation and we went inside. i have lived in this same house since 2005 and i have a fair understanding of the flight pathes that local and tia traffic travels. the only odd ball lights ive seen so far is the occasional police or ems copter fly over , and maybe less than a handful of light aircraft have i observed at these hours flying about. -but- this light and flight pattern did not fit any that i have ever observed either in the military or as a civilian. please contact me via email if you have any questions. thank you
content.summary: Lights blink off on 5 count

content.detailedDescription:
As submitted to assistant state director by phone today: 

"i was driving towards downtown lee's summit after work last night when i saw a very large and low flying craft with three red lights on each side and several blue lights on it moving very slowly in a north direction. it was the size of a large cargo plane. i could not see any wings or tail and there was absolutely no sound.  i called my buddy and he saw the same thing from a different location (his report is filed). i will submit a drawing.  i did not have a camera with me at the time." 

note: the witness was at work while i spoke to him and he didn't have much time to talk.
content.summary: Very large triangular craft over lee's summit, missouri

content.detailedDescription:
Report taken by assistant state director today: 

"i was driving north on woods chapel road in lee's summit while heading home from work and saw people stopped and looking up. i stopped at a stop sign and saw a huge craft with multiple green, white, and blue circlular shaped lights on the bottom of it come directly over my head. the lights were all on the bottom in a triangular shape. the size was enormous. to give you an idea for the size - it filled up the entire windshield of my car.  it was moving very slowly in a north direction towards the small lee's summit airport.  that airport is too small for large planes to land.  i see planes in the area all the time but this was not normal. a co-worker of mine saw it too.  it was flying very low.  at first we thought it was a large plane, but it did not look like a plane at all.  after it turned towards the airport, it slowed for one minute, then contineud north, which was left of our position, and it went out of sight. i am sending a drawing to the investigator."
content.summary: Gigantic low-flying craft on its side over lee's summit, mo

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from the umkc campus after my night class at 8:10-8:15 on emanuel cleaver blvd along brush creek. i had just past gates bbq at the paseo headed north/east towards raytown. i saw about a 1-2 miles away a v shaped aircraft with several orange lights very close to the tree line. they were not blinking. it did not appear to move like a normal airplane, it hovered. i first thought it was a large jumbo jet making an emergency landing in the location of 350 highway near 435. but the distance from where i was to where the object was made it too big to be a commercial plane. i continued to drive north/east on emanuel cleaver hoping i'd see it closer but i lost sight of it in the trees once i passed 71 highway. i used to live near whiteman afb when i was in college and would see b2 bombers and other military planes, this was nothing like i'm used to. it was too big.

when i got home my fiance told me he had seen something odd in the sky in independence where we live. he was on 39th street near the independence center. he saw the aircraft hovering in the sky around 7:40-7:50 over 470/291 towards the bass pro shopping area (west direction). he said it was v-shaped with and had lots of blinking lights. he thought it was a plane but it moved too slow and circled around to much. he said at one point it went vertical and hovered then broke into three parts. 

it kind of freaked me out that he saw the exact same object and told me about it before i said anything to him about what i had seen. that just struck us both as odd and not normal. hence why i'm submitting this report. i've seen other reports through mufon on a blog and those reports are similar to ours.

i would definately like to know if the military is testing an object over civilian areas without informing us or if this really is what i believe it is.
content.summary: Kansas city/raytown/independence mo ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking pics of the "pink moon" on 4/17/11. i was using a kodak 10.2 mega pixel camara affixed to a tripod. lens setting was for distant scenery at night. pics were taken from an upstairs bedroom with no glass or screens in place. no inside lights were on & no flash was used. 
 i took about 12 pics but only 1 showed anything. i downloaded them the next day but didn't immeadiatly notice anything.
 this object was the only 1 out of about 1200 pics i have taken with this camera.
 what ever this is in the picture is partially behind a prominant tree in the shot so this couldn't be a reflection.
                                              respectfully hedlok
content.summary: Unknown object in night time photo

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my laundry window facing east. i was talking on the phone and saw the object.  it looked like the stealth bomber because of the shape. it was a large triangle with white and green lights pulsing.  the object appeared to be on its side.  so i walked to my back door to take a look outside and by then it was gone.  i thought to myself, if it was the stealth i could hear it.  since i have heard the stealth fly over many times before.  there was no noise.  i stood there for a moment and a helicopter flew by coming from southeast going northwest.  i noticed the helicopter was much higher than the object. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Saw an  object in the sky on october 4th over lees summit

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving north on todd george road approaching 350 hwy in lee's summit at approximately 7:50pm (best guess on my part, did not look at my clock). saw out of my windshield what i thought was a large airplane with numerous lights (did not count how many, but best guess is 6 large blinking lights, with smaller non blinking lights in between...Perhaps a total of 12) flying extremely low and without much speed. very first thought (because of the size and how low it was) that perhaps a commercial jet was attempting some kind of emergency landing (quickly ruled that out). next thought was that it was perhaps a few different smaller aircraft flying in formation, perhaps practicing at night for an airshow or flyby of arrowhead stadium (quickly ruled that out as well because of speed, appeared to be almost hovering, or simply going extremely slow). at that point, because of the speed, i assumed it must be helicopters; ruled that out because of how close they would have to be flying to one another, and the fact that i could not hear any noise whatsoever. furthermore, at this point it was close enough that it seemed to be one solid object (although i freely admit my mind could have been playing tricks on me). the object was coming in from the north, flying south...Again, extremely slow, and blatantly obvious, i don't see how it could have been missed by anyone that happened to be outside or driving at that time. the object then turned west and appeared (to me anyways) to break up into three separate pieces for a few moments, then join back together.

i am typically a very skeptical person by nature. from a rational standpoint my assumption is not that this was any kind of extraterrestrial craft coming to visit the kansas city area, but rather one of two things:

1. either this was a group of (somehow silent) helicopters, with absolutely the most insane pilots on the face of the earth for deciding to fly and maneuver as close as possible to one another. or...

2. this was some kind of experimental aircraft, convincing me that the u.S. military has developed what i would consider the coolest and most awe inspiring aircraft in their fleet yet (blows the stealth out of the water).

regardless, whatever it was, i could not identify, and felt intrigued enough to think about it all night long, and find a place on the web where i could report it this afternoon(and read other individuals descriptions as well).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very intriguing unidentified flying object (perhaps objects)

content.detailedDescription:
A  lot  of  light  with  different  shapes  but  the  most  common  was  rob  cilindrical    the    sound  was  like  microwave  oven  and  the  rob  absorved  electrostatic  charges  in  the  air, no  more  than  30-40 centimeters, like  1-2  feet
around  the  12  at midnight  on  october  3  2011, after  the  cloud  was  open  the  staragate  a  lot  light  started  to  exist  through  my  neiborhood  and  the  went  to  the  everglades  of  south florida 
i  don���t  see  any  helicopter  o  airplain  in  the  area  but  in  the  north  you  can  see  the  comercial airplain way  thru  the  miami airport     
  


sorry  by  my  english, i  am  speak  spanish
content.summary: Rob cilindrical  light  shapes

content.detailedDescription: I also observed the "carnival ride" sighting in lees summit.  the actual cause was a group of small planes flying in tight formation.  each plane had about 6 lights and made quite a sight.  i live right next to the lees summit regional airport and the planes were landing and taking off from there.
content.summary: Tight formation of small planes

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside, in my backyard taking on the phone when i noticed a very bright white circle flying over my house.  the object was flying southeast.  it was approximately 500 feet high.  i ended my phone call to try to make sense of what i was witnessing.  there was no sound coming from the object, it was very bright, and was not blinking at all.  i watched it as it flew off in the distance, then it stopped moving for a couple of seconds, then it disappeared. amazed by what i just saw, i went inside and told my wife.  she thought i was making it up, but i got her to come outside to see if we could see any more.  about ten minutes later we saw a chevron shaped aircraft flying over my neighbors house.  it had at least 5 white blinking lights on the back, and on red blinking light in the front.  underneath there were three very large, distinct, triangle shaped lights that did not blink.  the best way i can describe the lights on the underside of the aircraft is to compare them to dome lights in a car.  this aircraft did not make any sound, and was flying in a strait line from west to east.  we watched the aircraft fly towards the east until it was too far to see.  after that we decided to stay outside and sit in the hammock and stare at the sky.  it wasn't long before we noticed objects moving in the sky in the far distance.  there were lights moving from one end of the sky to the other.  these were very high up in the sky, miles away.  if i didn't know better, i would have thought they were shooting stars, but they were not as fast as shooting stars.  we saw about 3 of these lights moving around.  one of them flew across the sky and then lit up about 10x brighter for about 2 seconds, then i knew for certain they were not shooting stars.  after watching that for about 4 minutes, we lost track of them.  then maybe 10 minutes later, another chevron shaped aircraft, identical to the first, flew the exact same flight path of the one the flew over my neighbors' house about 20 minutes before.  we didn't see any more after that one flew away in the distance.  i know it sounds crazy, but that is what i saw.
content.summary: Extremely bright white circle in the sky, flew overhead, then hovered and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: While looking at my footage from my security camaras fom the night before i seen this .
content.summary: Ufo's checking out my security camara   ridgecrest ca.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my classes headed from benton towards little rock. it was still pretty dark outside. as i passed the chicot road exit sign, at about 6:40am, i noticed a plane headed towards an oddly shaped craft in the sky. i first thought this was just another plane that i was viewing from the front instead of from the side like i was the other plane. as i watched, i noticed the craft had two lights, and the lights were very bright on this other craft and weren't blinking like the ones on the plane near it. from my perspective it looked cigar shaped, and i got the impression it was a saucer. the craft's two very bright lights stayed on the whole time i saw it. the plane seemed to be turning away from the object after a moment and was joined by another plane that i didn't see earlier as it was behind the treeline. the planes looked like they were descending beneath where the craft was. i don't know how far away the object actually was from the planes, but i do believe that it was pretty close to them. i then noticed that the craft disappeared from my view for a second, then reappeared, turned itself from a horizontal hovering position to a vertical position, and it shifted backwards in the sky like it was backing up. it backed up very quickly and so far, that it appeared to get smaller. after this it descended behind the treeline and disappeared from my view. i drove in the direction i thought it had gone but could not relocate it. i don't know where it went and i am having a hard time finding other witnesses as i was in my car. i did however look into the other cars when i initially saw this happen and the other drivers did seem to be seeing what i was also seeing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Ufo seen over university avenue and chicot road area in little rock.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were driving home around 8pm.  we saw this object that had shape of stealth bomber that had green and white lights hovering over the hiway.  at first i told my husband and children that i thought it was a blimp, but as we got closer it was doing weird maneuvers.  we turned around to get closer and by the time we got close enough it shot if like a rocket.  there was another object in sky that it flew over and the light on it was a white very bright light.  i then called my father(retired navy)  to ask him if stealth bombers hover and have gen and white less and he said no.  he said that it might be a harrin.  so i looked it up and it didn't look like it either.  so what was it that i saw???
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Family of 4 witnessed large stealth shaped object at 470 and 40 hwy

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:30pm on tuesday evening october 4, 2011, when while me and my friend had just came back from the shopping center. i had gone to get a new alarm clock, 
i needed to replace my old one, because my old alarm clock doesn���t work anymore.

after when we���ve parked the car on the side street heading toward my apartment, my buddy and me had notice a bright shining object up in the sky looking towards the east sky over by midway airport. 

i���ve pulled out my camera phone, and taken two different angle shot of two short video shots as i was documenting this event, of this unknown bright object up in the sky.

as we walked up mu buddy had noticed the object was moving towards us very slowly, but to me it had just hovered hanging there towards the east. none of us don���t know what it really was, because we could not really identified it; it could of have been a planet, 
a star, a satellite, space junk, or even a top secret spy drone that could be used to capture video images of the gang activity in the chicagoland area. 

a few of my neighbors was out in the parking lot over at my apartment complex fixing a flat tire on his truck. he said it was just a bright star, however nobody doesn���t know what it was what we had seen. 

i do not know what this was that i had seen last night, can anyone please tell me what me and a few others had seen last night up in the sky���
content.summary: A bright object up in the sky at chicago midway bedford park area

content.detailedDescription: Saw my first fastwalker yesterday around 6:30 sun going down to my back, looking up saw what i first thought might be a silver bird, very high up, spurting forward at different speeds, then when in line with half moon in northern sky flashed and gone in a second at tremendous speed.
content.summary: Fastwalker

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my 2 dogs in the yard this morning like i usually do.  i notice a very fast object moving across the morning sky at an incredible speed,faster than any jet.  it went horizontally from east to west at about 25-30 degrees elevation.  i would estimate that it was as bright and the size of a cars halogen headlight at 150 yard. it lasted only a second and then it was gone. i looked down at my watch and it was 4:59am. it made no sound and left no trail.
content.summary: Amazingly fast object moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: I went out my back door to smoke a cigarette and noticed something flying from behind a line of trees.  i first thought it was a small aircraft as we do have an airstrip in town and often have small airplanes flying around. however, this was just like a strip of lights and then just vanished after a few seconds of flying in a straight line.  at about arms length i would say it was about 2 inches.  my little girl was outside with me and even asked me "what happened?".  i waited  about 5 minutes then went in to give my two girls a bath.  after about 10 minutes my mother came downstairs and came in the bathroom..I immediately told her that i saw a ufo..She was shocked because her and her husband just came back from a walk and she had just seen what she described as something burning, falling from the sky.
content.summary: I observed an object coming from behind the tree tops that had a row of lights on the bottom and was a skinny rectangle.  it disappeared after 3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Oblect hovered obout 20ft, in the air the size of about, maybe half the size of a football feild. disc shaped a dull silverish metal color i observed the craft for about 45min or longer no visibal rivits or seams in the craft in the belt area of the craft i observed what appeared to be tares of light which reminded me of differnt colored socks you might see tumbling in a dryer the red tare looked to be 10ft long by 4ft wide. the blue tare tumbling randumly or maybe in unisin with the red, was id say 8ft long by maybe 6ft wide. the yellow tare of light looked to be maybe 12 ft long by 3ft wide. the green tare of light looked to be 6ft long by 4ft wide there was no sound from the craft and there was no sound from the frogs or crickets that struck me as odd, the bottom of the craft was a very bright white light that did not reflect onto the blacktop. the dome of the craft when i looked at it looked to be transparant just like the middle or better yet the center line of the craft then it moved just slightly to the left, the craft left no telltail sighns  i looked around and it was a good 2blks away from me at that time wich looked to be hiding behind two vary large oak tree,s and an old out door theater wich only covered up maybe one third of the craft for about 5min then shot strait up it seemed to take only 15sec to exit our atmosphear i could still make out the colors. i know that stars are bright pin points of light and not red,green,blue,yellow lights in the night sky. the craft apeared to imitate the distance of a star when the craft took off from it,s hover mode there was no sonic boom no noise nothing the image of the craft was burned into my mind for a very long time this happened in 1977 behind the karcher mall in nampa idaho at 3am my then wife and i are the only witness to this event my wife did not run outside to get a better look at like i did. allthough i have suspected for a long time that this in fact our technoligy that we have improved on from the old nazi prototyps of world war2 the hanaboos  with the thechnology of today our military tec is 50yr.S ahead of the privite sector or maybe a secret socity is developing this technoligy to what end maybe for the nepflem to make an entrance on 2012 dec 21st is my guess huh.. well i feel like a great weight has been lifted......
content.summary: Disk craft about the size of a football feild.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were heading to downtown kansas city on 435 n, near the i70 exit i noticed what looked like a very bright 3 lights that were blinking (first thought was that it was an airplane) until we got closer and the object was floating in the sky about 200 feet or less above. the lights now appeared to have different colors and there were about 7 of them in a triangular shape that somewhat looked circular. the objest was huge and just hovering above on the right side of the highway. it felt as if the object was so close that you could touch it. we drove under it and as we were passing it, it appeared to almost split apart (the lights were about 10ft apart from eachother and then they became like 30ft apart and it started to slowly move further north going along i70 but with loads of smoke coming from it.) we watched and seen helicoptors in the sky. at first we wondered if it could of been helicotors flying but the object was silent as for the helicoptor we saw earlier you could hear perfectly. as we were driving severeal cars on the highway were slowing down dramatically as it flew over. please please please if anyone knows anything about this please please post something! i am not a believe in ufo's nor aliens and after seeing this i am in utter awe!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Undescribable ufo kansas city 8/4/11

content.detailedDescription:
i waa driving along at night and noticed a large shadowlike object on the horizon descending over the tree tops just off towards the river. my car radio went fuzzy but i hardly noticed as i pulled over to see what was flying above the trees. i thought it was a stealth bomber at first but then remembered that they do not hover or make strange whistling sounds.
  the object was a boomerang shape around 150-200 ft. from wing tip to tip and around 75 ft. from nose to rear.It flew a short slow path of about a quarter mile over the river and slowly turned south and slowly cruised away, just making that odd whistling sound. i did not feel any effects or anything from the expeience just confusion from what not really knowing what i just saw,but i will say this, it did fly off to the south and dobbins air force base is located about 100 miles south of our town.                                                                           i do not know if the object flew off to the base or changed course after i lost site but i have seen other reports where ufo,s frequent military bases at times. this is bthe first i have told of this and i hope it might be helpful, thanks for listening, and believing.
content.summary: Driving north, observed large shadowlike object on the horizon as it grew larger as i got closer, i stopped to see what it was.

content.detailedDescription:
This is nuts, i saw a ufo when i was 14 w/my mom a long time ago in the distance but tonight was nothing like that. this was the craziest thing i have ever seen, i was soo close to it, i can't believe it. i was driving down interstate i-70 westbound came up to the 291hwy intersection that was backed up due to an accident on 291hwy south. i look up and saw this huge giant object beaming with white bright white lights all over it hovering in midair right above the i-70 and 291hwy intersection. it was hovering about 500ft. above the highway, i pulled the car over and watched it just hovering. i rolled the windows down to hear it but no noise whatsoever came from it. total silence just the cars passing by. i was freaking out and yelling i could not believe my eyes what i was seeing. my family was with me and we were all freaking out. within about 2-3min of hovering it turned south and started at a straight path going south, i tried to take pics but my camera on my phone couldn't pick it up enough. i saw the rear of the craft and it was huge. the back had 3 separate box shaped glowing lights that looked as though they were spreading apart. it headed along 291hwy south but was more flying over the cliffs homes area direction. 291hwy south was closed off by police due to the wreck so i couldn't follow it but i did head down 40hwy west off of 291hwy and then went south on lees summit rd but did not see it due to soo much traffic backup and trees. 

the shape was like a small pyramid, dome ontop but covered in bright white lights, lots of them, then as it turned i saw the bottom of it and the side. the bottom view was a v shape with a few lights also had blinking blue lights near the bottom of the craft. but the bottom view was total v shape no doubt about it. then as i saw it from the rear, i could only see 3 bright white square shapes in a row but not straight in a row, all 3 rear square lights were in different angles.

this has changed my life going forward. i have never seen anything like this nor have been as close to one. i mean this thing was hovering right outside the car window above me at a 45degree angle in front of me. 

just pure crazy.... amazing! i never thought i would see one again in my life.

the pic i have attached was taken with my cell phone but for some reason i dont know why does not look like what i saw. but i figured i might was well attach it. better than nothing.
content.summary: Craziest thing i have ever seen, this is real!!

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside to let dogs go to bathroom at 8:00 pm eastern standard time. very clear starry night, with half moon in the south, 30 degrees off horizon. i happened to look up, and spotted a fireball with a prominent tail come streaking in from space at 60 degrees above the horizon, traveling from east south east to west north west. the fireball was quite large and pronounced, with a large tail indicating falling debris melting off from re-entry, and was a bright white color like phosphorous.
the size was about dime sized as held at arms length, or 50% of the size of the half moon.
i must emphasize that i am familiar with judging mass and size of objects dropping to the ground from space. this object had to be massive, and it remained illuminted all the way to the ground as well, while most meteors or meteorites extinguish after passing half way through our atmosphere. it is extremely rare for an object to survive reentry unless it has a lot of mass to burn off of it.

this object may have been the german roentgen satellite (rosat) falling to earth after reentry. it was estimated it would fall back to earth in late october or early november of 2011, but, that was just an estimate, and its reentry orbital path was supposed to take it to 53 degrees north and south latitude when its orbit decayed and it fell into the gravity well, well within the bounds of southern michigan.

the duration of the siting was only two to two and one half seconds, but boy, what a view! this event reminded me of space shuttle debris reentry as shown on video.
content.summary: Fall of object from space - maybe large space debris or rosat satellite

content.detailedDescription: I was on raytown road and 63rd street sitting at a red light.  i was heading to a friend's house.  i noticed the object because a lady in the car next to me had out a video camera and was pointing it at the sky.  when i first saw the object i knew it was a ufo because i have never seen anything like that before.  i am familiar with commercial airplanes and military airplanes and this was neither.  the object was hovering over the raytown water tower.  it hovered for five seconds from when i first saw it, then it rose up ten feet flipped over and slowly flew down raytown road toward the west.  i chased after it and all of a sudden it emitted a black contrail and increased speed dramatically and disappeared.  i thought it was the craziest thing i have ever seen and didn't think anyone would believe me.  a friend of my sister posted on facebook that her son had spotted a ufo in the lee's summit mo area.  after i spotted the ufo i called kmbc news and they reported four or five spottings of the same aircraft.
content.summary: The ufo hovered over raytown water tower then flew away.

content.detailedDescription: Was laying in back of our motorhome watching the sky surprised that the half moon was out at only 4 p m.  noticed the sky was compleatly cloud free from the horizon for as far as i could see in 3 directions.  we were traveling e. on i40 just n. of jackson, mississippi & i kept looking at the moon on the n. side of our rig & watching how it went from one side of the picture window to the other.  thinking how the road really wasn't straight & trying to find it again when it was hidden by trees occasionally.  all of a sudden i thought i saw 2 white balloons come down from behind the moon, one following the other.  they went halfway back up, then to the left & i thought the wind was blowing the balloons around.  since the change in direction was kinda jerky & abrupt, i sat up to take a better look.  that's when i noticed they weren't balloons but ufo's that seemed to be playing a game of "catch me if you can."  they would go in a direction one following the other till the back one caught up, then they would turn around & the front one would kinda chase the other.  they did this going both clockwise & counterclockwise over & under the moon.  i thought these things were not as far away as the moon but then they proceeded to go around the moon in the same direction the equater goes around the earth.  they would disappear behind the moon & then come back in front from the other side.  after awhile they just went in every direction darting around & going behind clouds & coming out again.  this was very odd to me because there were no clouds visible in the sky, on taking a better look the "clouds" they were going behind were more brown than cloud color.  they went away completely & then came back, came towards the rv (still far up) & had something hanging from the bottom of both.  reminded me of the shape of hot air balloons now & while trying to get a better look they went back to their origonal shape, darted around a couple times & disappeared.  i'm very curious as to if anyone else saw them, i kept telling my husband to look but he was driving & couldn't even see the moon!  he takess his driving very seriously, pulls off the road for cell phone calls so i know he wouldn't try hard to see a ufo.
content.summary: 2 circular solid white balls decend from behind half moon, circle clockwise & counterclockwise around moon then go behind & front of moon.  something drops down from each ball shape then retracks & they go off in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went out front of our home to smoke a cigarette, as i do not smoke inside.  it was about 9 pm.  i looked in the sky in front of me towards town, and there was a bright red pulsating light.  i called my children outside because two nights prior we saw something similar in the sky while driving and it flew at low altitude over the highway.  it was so strange that we turned around to look again to find out what it was but it had quickly disappeared over the tree line.  my son came out first he is 15, and i asked him if that was what we saw the other night.  he said yes, then my daughter came out and began to make fun of us because she did not believe in  ufo's she is 16.  the object hovered there for about three or four minutes, then moved toward our home.  as the object moved closer over the house we began to see that there were lights at each corner of the aircraft and a red pulsating light in the middle.  we continued to watch as it slowly flew silently over the house toward the mountains.  we watched it until it was over the mountains and it hovered there for about five minutes as we were watching this aircraft we noticed that there were three more similar objects that were flying in the same direction as that one.  then one came back and flew over our house again.  we watched as it flew back toward town.  then we looked to the right and over the tree was a very large bright looking star thing.  i had never seen something so large in the sky that looked like this.  it definitely was not a star.  i told the children to get my keys because i wanted to get a closer look at the star thing because it was so strange and it did not look like a solid object.  as we drove right the star thing was to our left.  we pulled out about a quarter mile away and the star thing moved above the field across the road.  i turned left and it seemed as though it followed our car.  i got scared and decided to turn around and go down the highway to get away from there but it continued to follow us several miles down the road.  i got scared and called my husband on the phone.  my children were freaking out, so i turned around again and drove back to town where it was populated.  as i drove into the shopping center parking lot it was still there along side us above the grocery store.  then we saw a helicopter go back and fly over our house at a low altitude.  i decided to go back home.  as i pulled in the driveway and turned back around it was in the same spot as before we left only a little higher and dimmer.  i called the neighbor over because i just could not believe what just happened.  i told him to get into the car and drive with me to see what we just saw.  the star thing followed us again.  as we drove down the highway we saw ambulances, fire engines, and police cars sitting in the back of a cemetary with lights flashing.  we did not know what was going on.  we could not explain what was happening and the neighbor got freaked out.  we went back to the house and my husband had come home. so i told the neighbor to stay at the house while we drove the same path to see if he could see it follow my husband and me.  it sure did follow us except when we called the neighbor on the cell he said it had not moved.  this was impossible because it followed along side of us several miles down the road in the opposite direction.  when we came back another triangle aircraft was hovering off in the distance.  we decided to come inside because we were frightened.  i got on here and decided to report this activity.  this is something that we have never experienced before. i am afraid to look outside to see if anything else is going on, and our children are going to sleep on our floor tonight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange aircraft seen in sky followed by a large starlike object which followed us

content.detailedDescription: Driving along i-70eb in independence,missouri, headed home after a quick run to the store, my husband and i, with our two kids in the backseat all saw strange lights headed towards us over the highway. the closer we got, we realized the object was just hovering very low over the cars moving extremely slow. there were hundreds of huge, extremely bright lights completely covering the front of the craft. these lights were almost blinding, and resembled stadium lights. we pulled over to try and take pictures with my phone, only two came out somewhat okay. traffic was slowing and two ramps next to us were shut down due to a wreck we believe. many were in the area and had to of seen it along side us. as we were trying to take pictures out of the window, the craft was over our car and began to turn south, no sound whatsoever was coming from it, dead silence other than the passing cars on the highway. the underneath and back of the craft didn't have as many lights as the front head on. it was gigantic,the front seemed rounded then boomerang or arc shaped as it turned(not sure if it changed shape, but for sure two different shapes compared with head on to the back side of it) it took off a little bit faster, but still at fairly low speed(compared with airliners or even stealth bombers which would both be very loud, this again, was silent) after it turned away, my husband thought it broke into three separate pieces, i thought it was just so big, it expanded and the three brightest lights appeared to be separate. we tried to follow the path, but with traffic backed up, we eventually lost sight after a 45 minute drive. definitely not something either of us have seen, tried to stay calm not to frighten our two little ones in the back. would love an explanation.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo flying over busy i-70 interstate for a long time.

content.detailedDescription:
At my parents house watching tv my mother went outside on the deck and noticed this blinking type of light and after looking through some binac's she called me outside to have a look. there was one not moving but had 3 lights red, green and white and about every 3 to 4 minutes it would look like it flashed a light away from itself. we looked around and noticed 2 others doing the same thing. during this time 3 aircraft flew around the area. 

i normally am a skeptic to these types of events as i do paranormal investigations, but i do not research ufo's. i looked for any logical explination as to why we were seeing these but could not come up with one unless the military has some new aircraft that i do not know about.

i am familiar with landing lights on aircraft and with military aircraft as i served in the army.

we observed this object for about 45 minutes then went back in the house. as far as feellings, well nothing really suprises me anymore after doing paranormal research for 15 years

i do not have good enough equipment to get good pictures. i have a cheap digital that really sucks for photos, i have several nikon film cameras but can not shoot night shots at that distance and i have a video but it is really fuzzy.

i will see if these appear again but if you have any sugestions as how to document these, please let me know.

one other thing i noticed, we are in a flight path for msp airport traffic but the aircraft that we saw was not following that pattern.

maybe this was nothing but thought i would atleast let you know. please feel free to contact me, if you can not reach me by my cell please e-mail me.
content.summary: 3 objects spotted at equal distance and altitude approx 20 miles apart

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on i-81 through virginia at about a quarter after 4am my sight was drawn up to the sky by a newly appearing green burst of light, it looked like a signal flare but really big, and it dropped over the horizon with a trail behind it and then, when it fell beyond where i could see, there were 2 flashes of light, as if lightning had flashed twice, but it had a greenish hue and there wasn't any foolowing sound... thats all i saw.
content.summary: Unidentified falling object
